issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw:
Baila,

Running the `osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:latest` docker image is equivalent to running `ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign ...` from a local Subt workspace \(e.g. `subt_ws`\)

You can use [Cloudsim](https://www.subtchallenge.world/) to test your solution \(_using simple and practice worlds_\) and to submit your \(one-time only\) final solution for the Tunnel Circuit competition.

You can include the `worldName` parameter in the local launch command. Practice worlds have 20 artifacts.

Finally, I really encourage you to go through the [documentation](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/Home). it will provide you with more details and it can save you time.
content.html:
Baila,

Running the osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:latest docker image is equivalent to running ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign ... from a local Subt workspace (e.g. subt_ws)

You can use Cloudsim to test your solution (using simple and practice worlds) and to submit your (one-time only) final solution for the Tunnel Circuit competition.

You can include the worldName parameter in the local launch command. Practice worlds have 20 artifacts.

Finally, I really encourage you to go through the documentation. it will provide you with more details and it can save you time.
